name: [LD52] GogoRabbit'sTrap
description:
You are a Gogo Boy and you are forced by the cultist to seduce the passengers, lure them into a dark room and sacrifice them to get a soul.

Otherwise the manager will sacrifice you!

This is a short prototypes.

You can achieve 4 different endings in this version according to your choices.

Control:

Left mouse button :  Drag cards on the other cards

For example, drag to GOGORABBIT to serve GUEST

After the LOVE POINT of GUEST reaches the HIGHEST, you can SACRIFICE him!

V1.1:

- Fix some initial position of the card

- Fix the UI that not clear
